author: Redjumpman
aikaterna
description: Admins can generate a unique coupon id that can be redeemed for a set number of points only once. DM the code to the user of your choice.
name: Coupon
install_msg:
**Economy must be in the guild-based bank account mode for you to use this cog.**

Thank you for installing Coupon from Jumper Cogs.
If you like my cog please star my repo or post any issues on my github here:
https://github.com/Redjumpman/Jumper-Cogs
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
